version_description:
• New Scan/Search button makes it easier to find anything

• New, updated style for a more magical experience

• Bug fixes for improved operation

•Touch ID makes logging in seamless and super simple
•Your latest product searches will now be saved, so you can finish your shopping lickety-split!
•Speed is key when you’re on the go. Our app is now faster than ever due to its supercharged code!
•As you shop in-store, you can receive awesome alerts about promotions, events and more with our iBeacon technology
•Product pics are now as clear as a sunny day due to a retina HD display

iOS 9.0 compatibility
Minor Bug Fixes

-Faster checkout experience
-Simpler navigation makes it easier to shop
- Find your nearest Disney Store
- Be the first to hear about our best sales with push notifications
-Enjoy rich character imagery which gives you greater visibility to product detail
-Save with highlighted promotional offers that make it easy to spot savings
-Use Apple Pay. The easy, secure, and private way to pay on your iPhone, plus use your iPhone 6s, iPad Air 2 or iPad mini 4 to pay with a single touch.
-Use the in-app scanner to access additional product information while in store
-Sign-in is a snap! Login with Touch ID
-Location services can be enabled to enhance the Store locator feature and enable informative push notifications (optional).

3D Touch support for App Icon and Product Details
iPhone 7 & 7 Plus
Apple Pay enhancements
Bug Fixes

- Sprinkled some pixie dust behind the scenes to improve your experience.
- Tap to zoom in on product images.

- Sprinkled some pixie dust behind the scenes to improve your experience.
- Order History and Order Tracking for your previous purchases!
- Sprinkled some pixie dust behind the scenes to improve your experience.
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.
Minor bug fixes and further guest optimizations.
- minor bug fixes to improve the Guest experience
Updated to shopDisney, the new destination for the largest selection of authentic and exclusive Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Star Wars products.
Fixed a bug that was crashing the app for some Guests.

- Improved features to make it easier to search and navigate.
- Bug fixes
This new version includes minor bug fixes and functional improvements to make your experience even better.
Fixed a bug that was crashing the app for some Guests.
Fixed a bug that was dropping your shopping bag when not signed in.
Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.
With this release, check out the new and improved D23 page! We also fixed bugs and improved overall app performance.

With this release, we added the option to seamlessly import certain aspects of your Disney Parks Profile over to shopDisney. You'll be able to use your saved Disney Parks payment method, billing address, and shipping address to check out quickly and easily. We also fixed bugs and improved overall app performance.

With this release, we've improved the navigation for better browsing and updated the homescreen with more content and visual variety. Plus, you can now select multiple choices within filters, so finding the products you're looking for is faster and easier.

With this release, we've introduced swipe to go back gestures to enhance navigation and new visual variety to help you quickly find seasonal promotions. Additionally we have addressed bug fixes and improved performance.
This release includes updated privacy and legal information.
With this release we have fixed bugs and updated performance for a better shopping experience. We have also temporarily removed Apple Pay.
With this release we are introducing a Wish List to help you save all of your favorites and share them with family and friends! We have also improved performance to help ensure a magical experience.
The latest version of shopDisney includes bug fixes and performance updates to create a more magical shopping experience.
With this release we are improving our checkout experience, introducing the ability to pay with multiple gift cards and adding Apple Pay as a payment option.
With this release we are enhancing the shopping experience, fixing bugs, and improving overall app performance.
This release addresses bugs and performance for a faster, more magical shopping experience.
This release addresses bugs and performance for a faster, more magical shopping experience.

We are introducing a new design to help give you an easier and more magical shopping experience. This includes a new navigation, shopping flow, and making your Wish List easier to access so you can save all of your favorites!
This release addresses bugs and performance for a faster, more magical shopping experience.
This release addresses bugs and performance for a faster, more magical shopping experience.
This release addresses bugs and login performance for a faster, more magical shopping experience.
